Brian Buma and I will be hosting a webinar with the Alaska Fire Science Consortium on April 16th, 2020 where we'll talk in more detail about our project to investigate changes in flammability in reburned forests in Interior Alaska. 

Full presentation [here](https://vimeo.com/409072072).
